hooks.command: if command -v swiftformat >/dev/null 2>&1 && find . -name '*.swift' -print -quit | grep -q .; then swiftformat . --config .swiftformat; echo "‚úì Code formatted with SwiftFormat"; fi

if command -v swiftlint >/dev/null 2>&1 && find . -name '*.swift' -print -quit | grep -q . && [ -f .swiftlint.yml ]; then swiftlint --fix --format --config .swiftlint.yml; echo "‚úì SwiftLint fixes applied and linting completed"; else echo "‚ö† SwiftLint, Swift files, or .swiftlint.yml not found"; fi

if [ -f 'Package.swift' ]; then echo "üì¶ Building Swift Package..."; swift build || echo "‚ùå Swift build failed"; elif find . -name '*.xcodeproj' -o -name '*.xcworkspace' | head -1 | grep -q .; then echo "üî® Xcode project detected - build manually with appropriate scheme"; else echo "‚ö† No Swift Package or Xcode project found"; fi
